---
title: "Morocco's Statistical Yearbook"
# draft: true
showtoc: true
---

**Source** : [HCP](https://hcp.ma)

The Moroccan Statistical Yearbook is the main statistical reference on Morocco. It contains data and indicators relating to the demographic, social, economic, financial and environmental fields.

The statistical information is structured in 23 chapters and is presented in the form of tables and graphs. Each chapter is introduced by a presentation of the sources, concepts and definitions of the information used.

Data refer, in general, to the latest year for which they are available and are provided, whenever possible, at disaggregated levels (urban/rural, regional and provincial).

## Ressources

- [Data Catalog](https://brocolidata.github.io/annuaire_statistique)
- [Data Exploration tool](https://share.stlite.net/#!)
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/brocolidata/annuaire_statistique)
